name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Senior Architect Engineer with over 9 years of experience, I specialize in designing and implementing robust **Adobe Experience Cloud**, **Microsoft Azure**, and **Amazon AWS** solutions. My expertise in **API**, **SOA**, and **web services** enhances my ability to create scalable architectures that meet dynamic business needs. I have successfully led cross-functional teams, ensuring seamless collaboration and stakeholder engagement, while driving strategic digital marketing initiatives and program management. I excel in delivering impactful technical solutions, mentoring junior engineers, and fostering a culture of innovation and excellence. My strong communication skills and executive presence empower me to convey complex ideas effectively and prioritize user experience across all projects.
